bibdata.title: ISO/IEC/IEEE International Standard Information technology
Telecommunications and information exchange between systems
Local and metropolitan area networks -- Specific requirements -- Part 9: Integrated Services (IS) LAN Interface at the Medium Access Control (MAC) and Physical (PHY) Layers

ISO/IEC/IEEE International Standard Information technology - Telecommunications and information exchange between systems - Local and metropolitan area networks -- Specific requirements -- Part 9: Integrated Services (IS) LAN Interface at the Medium Access Control (MAC) and Physical (PHY) Layers
bibdata.docidentifier: International Standard ISO/IEC 8802-9: 1996(E) ANSI/IEEE Std 802.9, 1996 Edition

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: A unified access method that offers integrated services (IS) to the desktop for a variety of publicly and privately administered backbone networks (e.g., ANSI FDDI, IEEE 802.x and ISDN) is defined. In addition, the interface at the MAC sublayer and the PHY Layer is specified.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
